text: Isobaculum is a Gram-positive and facultatively anaerobic genus of bacteria from the family of Carnobacteriaceae, with one known species (Isobaculum melis). Isobaculum melis has been isolated from the intestine of a badger in England. ==References== == Further reading == Category:Lactobacillales Category:Monotypic bacteria genera Category:Bacteria genera
title: Isobaculum
